left_column.header: UI driven data wrangler and cleansing
left_column.paragraph: Seamless, integrated experience from data preparation and cleansing to model development, evaluation and deployment.
Out of the box  support for common ML libraries such as SparkML
Built in scoring plugins take you from model development to running predictions on data in a few seconds.
